entries.content:
SUCCESS! Stream-formatter CSS integration complete. All 5 files edited successfully:
1. ResourceTypes.ts - Added streamFormatter to both interfaces
2. ResourceManager.ts - Added path configuration
3. CssUriResolver.ts - Added URI resolution
4. TemplateInjector.ts - Added token mapping
5. base.html - Added link tag

Build passed with 0 errors! Ready for testing.
Creating delta memory for stream-formatter CSS integration task. User confirmed success: "found it, thank you! great job!"

User wants to plan the fix for [data-incomplete] not being removed when streaming ends. He mentioned we should do it like we always do - turn it into text-stream-fragment. Need to research existing streaming completion logic and the text-stream-fragment pattern.
